hero.description: Sou um desenvolvedor Front-End especializado em criar soluções modernas e intuitivas com React e Vue

aboutMe.title: Sobre Mim
aboutMe.text: Minha jornada como programador começou em 2020, quando tive a ideia de criar um website pessoal. Durante esse processo, me apaixonei pela liberdade que a tecnologia oferece para resolver problemas, independentemente do seu tamanho. Desde então, continuei aprendendo sobre programação, especialmente em desenvolvimento web. Em 2021, ingressei no curso profissionalizante da Trybe, onde me qualifiquei para ser um desenvolvedor Front-End e desde então venho criando soluções com React e Vue.
aboutMe.text2: My journey as a programmer began in 2020 when I decided to create a personal website. Throughout the journey of building it, I discovered a genuine passion for the freedom technology provides in solving problems, regardless of their complexity. Since then, I have relentlessly pursued knowledge in programming, with a particular focus on web development. In 2021, I enrolled in the specialized training course at Trybe, where I honed my skills to become a Front-End Developer. During my time there, I completed several projects that enhanced my expertise in creating user-friendly interfaces and optimized web applications. As a developer, I’ve had the opportunity to work on diverse projects that improved user engagement and streamlined processes. I’m always eager to learn and embrace new challenges, aiming to contribute to projects that make a positive impact.
